DOC.brief_summary: A Multicentre Clinical Evaluation of a Decision Support Algorithm for Neonatal Seizure Detection: ANSeR
DOC.brief_title: ANSeR- The Algorithm for Neonatal Seizure Recognition Study
DOC.detailed_description: This is a multi-centre study. It will be based on routine clinical practice but will also allow for the off-line retrospective application of ANSeR to a well-defined clinical population in order to establish the potential diagnostic utility of the algorithm.
